column4: hi, I have a gz archive on cd and i don't know how to extract or unzip it
unless it's not a tarfile, in which case you can gunzip it
type it says is gzip archive?
yea, used tar but its not worked, command line is going crazy
eh... sounds like something is wrong.. or you didn't type the command right
and you don't need sudo to untar a file
i tried to extract it from gui but it says that it is not supported
no, mepis is dead because significantly fewer people use it, and it's a live cd
ubuntuis also live cd, Mepis live cd also installs as a full os
take it to ubuntu-offtopic, and also no one cares
